column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣
建設会社からの依頼だ。
column5: We've been commissioned by a construction company.
column11: We've been commissioned by a construction company.

column4:
区画整理のために、ある区画の
ビルをすべて撤去して欲しいそ
うだ。
column5: They want you to demolish all of the buildings in a block so that they can reorganize things.
column11: It seems they want you to remove all of the buildings in a certain section so that they can reorganise things.

column4:
作業のために、住民には
一時的に避難してもらった。
column5: For the purpose of the demolition work, the local residents have been temporarily evacuated.
column11: For the sake of the construction work, the local residents have been temporarily evactuated.

column4:
住民が避難している間に
すべての作業を終わらせ
なければならない。
column5: You'll have to finish up the whole job during the time the buildings are empty.
column11: You must use that time whilst the buildings are empty to finish up all of the work.

column4:
制限時間をこえると
依頼は失敗だ。
急げよ。
column5: If you go over the time limit, you'll fail the request, so hurry it up!
column11: If you exceed the time limit, you'll fail the request, so hurry it up.

column5: I'll give you a quick reminder:
column11: I'll give you a quick reminder.

column4:
/c5この区画のビルをすべて撤去
/c3するんだ。
column5: /c5Clear out all of the buildings that are in this block./c3
column11: /c5Clear out all of the buildings that are in this block/c3.

column4:
区画の周囲には
ポールを立てておいたよ。
column5: There are poles marking the perimeter of the block.
column11: There are poles marking the perimeter of the block.

column4:
ポールで囲まれた区画の
ビルを撤去するんだ。
column5: Make sure there's nothing left inside those boundaries.
column11: So make sure there's nothing left inside those boundaries.
